data.text: @EdTubb @hotSahs Super easy to tell the bots 🤖 on your thread. Reminder to all. Don’t engage with them. It boosts their status, comments and such. Just downvote and block . It is best so the bots don’t gain traction.
@EdTubb @CBCQueensPark how many heart attack deaths that day?

@JaimeJaime905 @EdTubb There are unfortunately many ways to die from covid, even if it doesn't get into the lungs.  Here are just a few
- blood clots
- cardiac arrest 
- systemic inflammatory disease

And then there's long covd - the cost of this will be astronomical in a myriad of ways

@EdTubb Stop saying misinformation. The 85 people did not die "of" covid, they died "with" covid. Two different things. Like, people shot dead by the police were added to the covid death stats because they tested + to covid after they died. Please be factual.
@annabcarey @Patrici78875033 @EdTubb And yet they told you all that if you take the vaccine you won't get it 🤣

@Patrici78875033 @EdTubb C'mon lol.

Death rate was actually the lowest. Don't fall for the tricks.
@EdTubb They died with omicron not from it. Important point

@EdTubb But 15% of those 5th waves deaths are Delta right?

Since previous waves were underreported by ~50% in Ontario, lets wait excess deaths data… https://t.co/NMl5ZP1mtY
